about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for a one-of-its-kind platformer game with hidden passages, deathly traps and a dazzling fantasy world. Your task is to outrun a menacing monster you awakened when digging too deep into sacred grounds.

The whole game is hand-drawn on paper! It is a hard challenge to escape from the monster, there are no checkpoints to make life easier.

If you’re looking for a game which tests your skills, provides captivating gameplay, provokes big laughs, and presents you with a distinct audio-visual experience, then Wormster Dash will surely satisfy your gaming desires!
detailed_description:
Prepare yourself for a one-of-its-kind platformer game with hidden passages, deathly traps and a dazzling fantasy world. Your task is to outrun a menacing monster you awakened when digging too deep into sacred grounds.

The whole game is hand-drawn on paper! It is a hard challenge to escape from the monster, there are no checkpoints to make life easier.

If you’re looking for a game which tests your skills, provides captivating gameplay, provokes big laughs, and presents you with a distinct audio-visual experience, then Wormster Dash will surely satisfy your gaming desires!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version El Capitan 10.11.6 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 512 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version High Sierra 10.13.6 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 512 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Wormster Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Prepare yourself for a one-of-its-kind platformer game with hidden passages, deathly traps and a dazzling fantasy world. Your task is to outrun a menacing monster you awakened when digging too deep into sacred grounds.
